author: dion
msg: Add dtd and module to resources
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: vmassol
msg: Use findVariable() instead of getVariable() so that the maven object is looked for in the hierarchy of Jelly contexts. Most notably this allows to use the <attainGoal> tag from within <j:thread> blocks.

author: dion
msg: reverse default behaviour of site - now you must specify pluginSite as
a non-null value to get the plugin pages to generate.
The default is now just the main maven pages

author: dion
msg: Fix bootstrap being broken when maven.home had spaces in it.
Bug was recently introduced by a Cygwin/Win32 fix
